name: dribdat
description: Dribdat is a platform for organizing hackathons and collaborative events. It lets organizers list projects, collect submissions, track team progress, and showcase results, all in a self-hosted, developer-friendly web application.
features: Project submissions: Allow participants to register teams and submit project ideas with descriptions and links.
Progress tracking: Monitor team activity and project development throughout the event with status updates.
Challenge management: Define hackathon themes, categories, and judging criteria for organized competition structure.
Team formation: Help participants find collaborators and join projects based on skills and interests.
Live dashboard: Display all active projects on a public page for attendees and judges to browse and vote.
Integration support: Connect with GitHub, GitLab, and other platforms to automatically pull project updates.
Judging tools: Provide scoring interfaces and criteria checklists for fair and structured project evaluation.
Event scheduling: Publish agendas, workshops, and milestone deadlines to keep participants informed throughout the hackathon.
